page.title: 20Twyford Arts and Crafts
page.content: {Local Crafts:}Mainly done as a hobby but sometimes for aditional family income.{Chair-Caning.}A lady of Poundon re-seats chairs in cane,rush or sea grass.A seat 12"x12" would cost 14 but 25 if done in rush.She also makes corn dollies.{Lace-making & {Crocheting.}Both done by an elderly lady in Twyford who crochets patterns and designs for a firm who sell cottons.{Soft-Toy Making}Another craft done by a Twyford housewife to help family expenses.A small teddy-bear costs 1.75.{Painting}Chris Scott is well known for his work.One,depicting a scene from the Carnival to commemorate the Silver Jubilee in 1977,hangs in the Village Hall.Flower Arranging,spinning and knitting are other crafts found in the area.The Group consists of the Mrs Cadd,Smart, Valance,Magson and Miss Hill.
